attributes.action: Abolish google classrooms from Culford school
attributes.background: It has been newly implemented into the school homework system. It is not as efficient as the previous system of the teachers telling us the work. The old system of the teachers telling us our work face to face was far simpler and more effective as we understood our preps and due dates better.

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the school, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
